mentioned_cpes: SIPLUS ET 200SP CP 1542SP-1 IRC TX RAIL (6AG2542-6VX00-4XE0)
SIPLUS ET 200SP CP 1543SP-1 ISEC TX RAIL (6AG2543-6WX00-4XE0)
issue_name: Multiple Vulnerabilities in Third-Party Components in SIMATIC CP 1542SP-1 and CP 1543SP-1 before V2.3

1.command: Update to V2.3 or later version
1.description: Update the affected products to version V2.3 or later. The update can be found at: https://support.industry.siemens.com/cs/ww/en/view/109954475/
